name: By The Numbers 2 Online Quiz | By The Numbers | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many players on a cricket team?
How many inches around was Scarlett O'Hara's waist at the beginning of "Gone with the Wind"?
How old is Delta Dawn in the country and western song of the same name?
What portion of an iceberg shows above water?
How many players are there on a hurling team?
How many years did Sleeping Beauty sleep?
How many bones are there in the adult human body?
How many pints of blood are there in an average human being?
How many years does Lincoln mention in the Gettysburg Address?
In American football, how many players from one team are on the field at the same time?
